text:
The 'p4counter' task gives the following example/instructions for obtaining a
value from the server and placing that value into a property:

    Set the value of the "p4.last.clean.build" property to the current value of
the "last-clean-build" counter:

    <p4counter name="last-clean-build" property="${p4.last.clean.build}"/>

The example should have the '${' and '}' removed from the property tag so it
reads as follows:

    <p4counter name="last-clean-build" property="p4.last.clean.build"/>

If the '${' and '}' characters are present in the call, the value of the
property is not modified.
creator: dsmith@everest.nu
